column4: i am trying to install xchat 2.6.8 on feisty fawn, but the package returned an error, "dependency is not satisfiable: libdbus-1-2". how could i get around that?
afaik you get that version of xchat just enabling backports
could you elaborate?
i lied it is 2.8.4 in backports
if you have the feisty-backports repository enabled you get xchat 2.8.4
are they enabled by default?
no, i get them using source-o-matic to generate a sources.lst
add a line like this to your /etc/apt/sources.list  >> deb http://es.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu feisty-backports main restricted universe multiverse <<
done. next step?
well instead of http://es.archive... you should have used your country code (es: --> Spain)
where are you from?
located in england.
would it be uk?
instead of es on that line you should use uk
yes
gb or uk? :P
if shearn89 says it's gb i trust him ;)
as do i; changed to gb. what now?
just 'sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade'
thanks; doing.
my bandwidth :(
are you here?
sorry i was away what were you saying about your bandwitch?
